remarks: Equivalence for subclass relation, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Jul-1994.)  (Revised by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
statement:
dfss2f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
dfss2f.2 $e |- F/_ x B $.
dfss2f $p |- ( A C_ B <-> A. x ( x e. A -> x e. B ) ) $.
